page.title: 04A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: ON SATURDAY MORNING I USUALLY WAKE UP AT SEVEN O'CLOCK AND READ FOR A LITTLE WHILE. THEN I GET WASHED AND DRESSED AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST OF WEETABIX AND TOAST. THEN I GO TO WEST LINTON FOR MY GYMNASTIC LESSON. THIS GOES ON UNTIL QUATER PAST TEN. WHEM WE GET HOME I WATCH SATURDAY SUPERSTORE ON TELEVISION OR PLAY WITH MY GUINEA PIG GEORGINA. SOMETIMES ALISON PHONES AND I GO DOWN TO PLAY WITH HER. USUALLY WE PLAY ON THE BIKES AND ALISON'S MUM TAKES US TO PEEBLES SWIMMING POOL. SOMETIMES WE PLAY INSIDE : BOARD GAMES LIKE CLUEDO AND SORRY. AT HALF PAST FIVE I HAVE TO GO HOME. WE USUALLY HAVE SHEPHERD'S PIE FOR TEA. AFTER TEA I FEED GEORGINA AND CLEAN OUT HER HUTCH. WE WATCH TELEVISION LATER THAN USUAL UNTIL BED TIME.
